stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1 - From The Merge Berlin
stable.description:
A major update, supports for advanced color channel viewing, adds Lossless Compression tool, Startup Boost mode, new image loading orders

Visit Us at The Merge Conference on June 14, 2024 ‚≠ê

ImageGlass is proud to be one of the open-source projects that will be exhibiting at The Merge Conference in Berlin, Germany. If you're attending, be sure to visit our booth and explore other amazing open-source projects!
